Specimen Type(s): Surgical pathology slides prepared from formalin-fixed paraffin embedded (FFPE) tissue
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Viewer+ software for digital review and management of scanned surgical pathology slides (FFPE) as an aid in primary diagnosis.
Indications for Use Summary: Viewer+ is a software-only device for viewing and managing digital images of FFPE surgical pathology slides, aiding pathologists in primary diagnosis; not for frozen sections, cytology, or non-FFPE hematopathology specimens.
